website_summaries.verdict: Even though it may have some quirks typical to soccer balls, for the most part, the Mikasa lives up to its "serious" reputation when it comes time to take it on the field.
pros: This ball has superior qualities that make it a top pick among players, including soft, synthetic material that makes it easy to kick, substantial construction, attractive looks, and a 1-year warranty
cons: Sizes have been known to be "off

customer_reviews.title: Very nice ball.  Also makes a good weapon - because kids will turn anything into a weapon
customer_reviews.text: This soccer ball is a very nice quality item. Arrived on time and the price was perfect. We have 5 sons so we will see how long it takes them to turn this ball into a weapon. OK, one of them just got a soccer ball to the crotch so that took roughly 25 seconds. Great ball and I'm sure it will withstand a lot of kicks and impacts until they leave it outside and I accidentally run it over with the riding mower.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Anne

customer_reviews.title: Really nice quality. Bought them for Operation Christmas Child
customer_reviews.text: Really nice quality. Bought them for Operation Christmas Child. Looking for a good quality soccer ball I found these and read the reviews which were excellent. Read others who bought cheaper balls that's reviews said they either would not inflate or would not stay inflated. I didn't want to take that chance since these will be going to very poor children. How sad that would be if their ball remains flat. Such a disappointment that would be for these children. PLEASE, if you are participating in Operation Christmas Child DO NOT BUY THE CHEAPEST BALLS.
customer_reviews.author: A. Linnekens

customer_reviews.title: Great balls for U8 and U10
customer_reviews.text: We got these as inexpensive practice balls for my boys. They get daily use and have held up fabulously well. They have a nice soft cover that feels like a more expensive ball. The referees in our games regularly choose these to use as game balls since they look and feel so great. They hold air well. We've yet to have to fill them with air again after initially filling when we got them several months ago. I'm now back to order more to donate to the school for recess play.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad option for shag balls
customer_reviews.text: My kid needed to work on goal kicks and rather than chase down the three or four he has, I decided to buy 10 of these. The only complaint my son had about the balls were the slick outer covering which I expected for the price. Pretty much any ball from any brand in this price range will have a cheap covering, so I don't have an issue with that. These were intended to be kicked and they have worked without issue. I've been thinking of maybe getting a few more if these hold up. I wouldn't get this ball if you wanted a good game ball, but for practicing your shots, they should work well.
customer_reviews.author: C. ToddTop Contributor: Soccer

customer_reviews.title: Great ball, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great ball, especially for the price. I purchased 4 size 4 for my U11 team as practice balls. They held their shape and inflation better than any ball I've ever owned. The feel and touch are better than any $30 and $40 big name balls I've owned. I purchased a size 5 for myself. I am completely satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: DBT

customer_reviews.title: Great soccer ball for kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought one last year for my oldest child (9) and it worked so well I bought another for my other kid (6) They hold air! Which is usually a problem for less expensive soccer balls. High quality construction, they often use this ball during soccer scrimmage because it just feels better.
customer_reviews.author: QChawks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect practice ball
customer_reviews.text: This ball does exactly what it should, provides a nice touch and is durable enough for long usage. We're using a size 4 which too often I find junk balls that look great but are poor quality or durability. We've used at least 10 different balls for practice and games and this is as good as I would want to spend money on for a size 4 youth ball. My ratings: Value: 10/10 Touch: 8/10 Durability: 7/10 Looks: 5/10
customer_reviews.author: Cville Dude

customer_reviews.title: Good soccer ball.
customer_reviews.text: Good soccer ball. I would by again - this is the one I practice with in the street and it takes the abuse pretty well. 5.0 / 5.0 for price.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Maciulewicz

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality for a Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Note that I bought this for playing by myself or with my dad, I am not an 'official' player: I was looking around for a soccer ball for a while and most of what I saw was fairly expensive, so when I saw this I thought it was worth giving a try. It. Was. Worth. It. The ball is durable and it makes exercising easier for me because I find soccer fun. I would highly recommend this, also note that it comes deflated (it says in the product description but I'll put it here too).
customer_reviews.author: Sara Moradi

customer_reviews.title: A Great Soccer Ball
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic durability. On par with balls 4 times the price. Not only does it look cool, but it can handle a lot of abuse. I was very pleasantly surprised and would definitely recommend this for training or practice. My son loves loves it and uses it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Albert

customer_reviews.title: High quality and soft feel
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this one in size three and four as my son has grown. Both balls have been better than any of others I have seen at games and practice, though maybe that's because I am old school and like to curve shots, and both hold their air well (better bladders). They are designed to be softer than typical balls that focus on branding.
customer_reviews.author: RestWeb

customer_reviews.title: Arrived INFLATED 10-24-2018
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a nice ball. Felt thick. (I do not play sports) My only complaint was the description stated "ships deflated" but it arrived inflated. Not so good when you're packing for Operation Christmas Child. I tried to get all the air out but it's never going to get as small as a never inflated ball. I wrapped big rubber bands around it to try to keep it small.
customer_reviews.author: farmgirl

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased for Operation Christmas Child, shoebox ministry. They were nice quality, soft and colorful. They arrived inflated so I had to deflate to fit them in the box but that was ok, jist wanted you to know. Arrived promptly. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Pam in Kentucky

customer_reviews.title: Classic look and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Classic look and very good quality. I bought the size-3 in black and white as a present for a 4-year old boy, and it was an instant hit. The ball comes inflated so it is ready to play as soon as you open the package.The surface is glossy. I'm glad that it does not have the artificial cushioned feel as that would make it less durable. It's too early to comment on the durability, but it looks great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Sidd

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable for soccer practice or game!! Perfect for a toddler as a toy!
customer_reviews.text: Ball blew up on a free kick u13 girls team I wish I never order them I took the ball as a gift donation for a girls team in Mexico!!!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Avila Jr.

customer_reviews.title: I like this ball ⚽️
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ball for my nephew and dad to play it came deflated but it was easy to inflate. It turned out to be a little smaller than expected. They play in the yard nothing professionally and they like it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephany Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Great U10 practice balls
customer_reviews.text: After a couple weeks of use and the balls look and response like new. No leak air. No turning into paper/rock like other balls at local stores in the same price range. I would buy them again if I need more. Great balls for U10 kids.
customer_reviews.author: L. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: but I think it's more likely the ball just isn't that great. I am going to try the trick of ...
customer_reviews.text: I was so hopeful about this ball, since the reviews overall are so positive. I've bought 2 of these in the last 6 months, and unfortunately, both have popped. Maybe my kids are extra rough on balls or something, but I think it's more likely the ball just isn't that great. I am going to try the trick of putting contact cement in the ball to see if I can plug whatever leak has sprung; perhaps I'll update if I'm able to bring the balls back to life.
customer_reviews.author: Christy H.

customer_reviews.title: Quality ball like Adidas used to make
customer_reviews.text: It's not as cheap as the deals for Adidas WC balls, but after buying some of those and finding they're nothing like past WC balls I've owned, we tried this one. Little pricey but it's pretty high quality, it's like Adidas used to make.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisMA

customer_reviews.title: Best training balls for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is the only ball I will buy for training. About 6 bucks cheaper than the bigger name brands but has the same quality. Designs are basic but these are training balls not match balls.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun S Collado

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT ARRIVE DEFLATED!
customer_reviews.text: Specifically looked for deflated balls to put in Operation Christmas Child boxes & was furious that I had to manually deflate every Mikasa ball!! Advertise it correctly!! Might as well have bought them at WalMart instead of waiting for them to be shipped. Once inflated it's also VERY hard to get ALL the air out. Will never order again!
customer_reviews.author: Reading is Valuable

customer_reviews.title: Bought for U8 Soccer Practice. Would Buy Again if Needed.
customer_reviews.text: I am a U8 soccer coach. Bought these because I needed balls for our practices. I have been using them for about a month. They seem to be holding up just fine. I have not noticed any air leakage. They come deflated so you will need a pump. I had one and was expecting that so that was no big deal. They seem to be well made. Happy with this purchase. It was a gamble for me since I am not familiar with this brand for soccer products.
customer_reviews.author: straightforward

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I would give zero stars if possible. Bought the children’s size 3 soccer ball for my son’s birthday. In a week it was completely flat. Low quality and garbage customer service by Mikasa. Emailed many times with no reply and never able to reach anyone through customer service number.
customer_reviews.author: lid222

customer_reviews.title: Good Ball
customer_reviews.text: Its a great little ball that has good bounce and holds air as well as any non-competition level ball I've used. This little guy always gets picked by our refs to be the game ball whenever I offer it.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great ball for a great price! My 4 year old started soccer this year and I didn't like the balls at my local stores. Mikasa is quality so I ordered this one and am not disappointed. It's well made and takes a beating. Arrives deflated (which I expected). I definitely recommend this ball for a young player!
customer_reviews.author: watson387

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and soft ball
customer_reviews.text: Nice and soft enough that my girl does not want to leave the practice field. We are not professional soccer players but like to chase the balls whenever we have time. The price is good. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Tran

customer_reviews.title: Great, new favorite.
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite low cost ball. Very soft, reasonably durable, and hold air good. The kids are not scared to get nailed by them, which is super important (in my opinion).
customer_reviews.author: Rainy Dan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Ball
customer_reviews.text: I played soccer for the better part of my youth. I coached youth soccer and played some college. I was hesitant about buying this ball because of its low price. When i received it, i immediately deflated it and re inflated it. Then did my spin test. This is simply just tossing the ball into the air just over your head and spinning it. If the ball wobbles as it spins, it is not a good ball and will result baf bounces and poor flight. This ball spun without wobbles. Itbia an amazing ball for this price.
customer_reviews.author: E.Davila

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for OCC shoeboxes - seems like a well-built ball
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for Operation Christmas Child shoeboxes, so I can't say anything more than it looked like a pretty tough ball when it arrived. I chose this one rather than one that was already deflated based off all the reviews. We deflated this and it fit nicely into the shoebox. I also purchased a pump to go with it (
customer_reviews.author: Liz Smith

customer_reviews.title: Plastic rock
customer_reviews.text: Ball is way too hard for a size 3. Air pressure had nothing to do with it. This is a plastic rock
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Good basic ball for a u10 league...It keeps the air well and I have the girls decorate it so they could tell one from the other.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Cheap slippery laminated finish
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and the Adidas Performance 2016 MLS ball at the same time for around the same price and the difference is remarkable. This ball has a slippery laminated finish that is obnoxious and makes it much harder to put spin on the ball. I thought a decent ball would cost significantly more and would have probably given this budget ball a better rating, but the Adidas ball spoiled me into expecting more for less.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Gilchrist

customer_reviews.title: Great soccer ball for kids
customer_reviews.text: Good price and it has held up well for my 8 year old. One of the better balls we’ve had.
customer_reviews.author: QChawks

customer_reviews.title: Deliver INFLATED instead of deflated.
customer_reviews.text: Only a 1 star because I ordered these for Operation Christmas Child. They were advertised as coming DEFLATED. I wanted to pack it in a shoebox as a wow gift, along with a pump. I can't fit an inflated size 4 ball in a shoe box. I have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Uprainier

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my U10 boy.
customer_reviews.text: This is often what my son's team practices with. They like the weight and it's held strong for 2 months without loosing air.
customer_reviews.author: Boyd Craven

customer_reviews.title: Poor bounce.
customer_reviews.text: The title sums it up, gook looks, appears well made but the bounce characteristics are poor enough that I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Manfish

customer_reviews.title: Great Soccer Ball for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Great ball! It holds air and is high quality, especially for the price. My daughter loves that it matches her Soccer Club colors. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Bosco

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely terrible - Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I waited 2 months to receive this item. It wasn't until after I email the distributor that I finally received the product. As soon as I got it, I pumped it up and it immediately started losing air through the fill hole. I was scammed.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: inflated
customer_reviews.text: Theses soccer balls were to be shipped deflated as per description. I purchased for Operation Christmas child to be put into a shoebox. I purchased four balls. All came inflated in separate boxes
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these, and they seem to do the job. I picked this brand cause it came in red, my son's favorite color. The one thing we've noted is that they seem to lose air faster than an Adidas ball we had before. But this isn't a huge problem, we have a pump handy anyway.
customer_reviews.author: mama_reader

customer_reviews.title: Defective!!!
customer_reviews.text: Went flat after 10 minutes of use by a 9 year old.
customer_reviews.author: James T

customer_reviews.title: I've had it for a while and it's held up ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for a while and it's held up very well. We use it at least 3 times a week in kicking drills. I have a bag of 10 so they're not getting beat up as often as if I only had 1.
customer_reviews.author: Monarchcx

customer_reviews.title: Very good ball handling characteristics
customer_reviews.text: So far, this is the best soccer ball I've come across when it comes to a combination of weight (just right), handling (much better than cheaper soccer balls sold at WalMart) and price (a good bit lower than Nike or Adidas balls). Durability is average and on par for the price. Will last you through a soccer season, but probably not through two seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Lux Lucis

customer_reviews.title: This one holds air
customer_reviews.text: Good quality ball. I’ve ordered soccer balls online in the past and they usually come in flat. This one holds air.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: The ball is well made good feel. One little issue noticed
customer_reviews.text: The ball is well made good feel. One little issue noticed, the ball is a little lite, not same weight as other balls i have had. The difference is barely noticeable. Might be that the material (leather or other) is slightly thinner then usual. still good to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Lubo

customer_reviews.title: Grandson Loves it
customer_reviews.text: Just what the grandson ordered for his b-day. It has lasted thru a whole season and he still gets a kick out of it.
customer_reviews.author: JimmyG

customer_reviews.title: We have used them 2-4 times per week for two months and they are still in good shape. They have basically been leak free thus ..
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 6 of these size 4 balls for a 5th and 6th grade team at the beginning of the season. We have used them 2-4 times per week for two months and they are still in good shape. They have basically been leak free thus far and are of good enough quality that I have used them as the game ball on more than one occasion. I would buy again and consider this the best soccer ball bargain on Amazon (at least when I bought them, which was $13 or $14 per ball).
customer_reviews.author: Kim kiywt

customer_reviews.title: Good buy overall
customer_reviews.text: This was a good product, really durable and tough. I got it for my dog because she was always playing with my sons basketball and I thought she would like her own ball. She has chewed on it, thrown it around the yard and kicked it all around.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Henson

customer_reviews.title: Coachers are very pleased, and more important
customer_reviews.text: For years we struggled to find a soccer ball that would not bankrupt our school, that would last a year of wear and tear, and that would not hurt our students. For some reason, the only option in Honduras has been the dreaded Molten soccer ball, which is cheap enough, long lasting, but TERRIBLE for kids. We hit a homerun with this purchase. Coachers are very pleased, and more important, kids are happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seriously ok.
customer_reviews.text: I picked up a few of these balls in different sizes based on the good reviews--they're generally fine for drills and juggling, and reasonably priced. However, my size-3 ball started leaking air after about 2 months of very light use. I also used a brand new size-5 ball in an adult rec game, and the stitches on one of the panel creases ripped. The stitching is probably fine for a youth game though.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Jo

customer_reviews.title: Not a FUTSAL ball. Somehow while searching for FUTSAL ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a FUTSAL ball. Somehow while searching for FUTSAL balls this came up and for some reason I didn't see that and bought two. As just a size 4 soccer ball I thought it was ok. Kind of hard.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M

customer_reviews.title: decent price for $15... ($10 savings over ...
customer_reviews.text: decent price for $15... ($10 savings over normal balls) ideally you can still get balls for <$10 if you look around at discount shops... but probably can't in bulk. a bunch of these "walk away" when other kids start playing with them, so it's not too expensive to replace.
customer_reviews.author: L. Caballes

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay inflated more than a week or so
customer_reviews.text: Leaks air and does not stay firm more than a week or so. I always wet the needle before inflating and never over inflated.
customer_reviews.author: David Stodola

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball!
customer_reviews.text: I have a pick up soccer group that has been playing for 10+ years. We started using these balls about 5 years ago. We use them 2x a week. They are simply awesome. Hold up well, feel great and almost never need air in them once you fill them once. This is simply the best value ball that there is out there.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Garcia

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: Might not be an Adidas or Nike or as good looking as them. But this ball sure has great quality, and material is great as well. Would definitely recommend if you are looking for a soccer ball.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Great ball
customer_reviews.text: Great ball especially for price. My children are 10 and 12 and really like this ball. Both children play rec and club soccer and it seems like their Mikasa ball 90% of the time gets picked for the game ball. I plan on purchasing the step up from this ball soon for Christmas. We have owned many balls but Mikasa will be our choice here on out , great quality and price .
customer_reviews.author: MYeamans

customer_reviews.title: Goes flat right away!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. I pumped the ball and it goes flat right away. Couldn’t even use the ball. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Meshellher9dez

customer_reviews.title: Great Soccer Ball
customer_reviews.text: Bought this soccer ball for my dog to kick around. She loves it and it works well for what we use it for. I've kicked it thousands of times and shes tried to bite through it a thousand more times without issue. This is the definition of a durable soccer ball. I'm not a soccer player, but it worked well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Smells terrible, like a cheap ball made with odd materials.  I returned it due to the smell
customer_reviews.text: Smells terrible, like a cheap ball made with odd materials. I returned it due to the smell
customer_reviews.author: Chris Biddle

customer_reviews.title: It's lasted the whole season- better than other balls we've used
customer_reviews.text: Kids like it. It's distinct enough that other kids won't end up walking off with it. And it has held up to a lot of use this season and still looks great with no tearing at the seams.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great ball for my beginner soccer player son. He’s excited to take it to his first practice. Comes inflated.
customer_reviews.author: mylovelylemon

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this ball, ideal for leisure with family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great ball
customer_reviews.text: I coach a youth team, and this ball is great. It's got the best feel from all the balls my team brings, and works perfect as a game ball.
customer_reviews.author: Gilgamesh

customer_reviews.title: Great practice ball for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner ball for me as I wanted to learn to play soccer again (20 years old). However, the ball could have been a little more inflated when it came in the package, and I could feel some defects along the seams of the ball. However, the ball has a soft cushion and feel to it and would easily buy this again for its low price.
customer_reviews.author: doug

customer_reviews.title: 6-8month old soccer player
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 8 month old grandson that loves to kick balls with his feet as I hold him up to walk around living room. It was nicer than expected.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Durable and good!
customer_reviews.text: Great beginners ball. If you are a parent or a grandparent trying to find a ball for a younger kid, this is your product. It is a soft ball that is easy to kick and head. Many soccer balls hurt to head the ball however this ball really minimizes the pain. Really a great ball for beginner players, also very durable so far!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Tears easily
customer_reviews.text: Ball has one year warranty. Cover ripped within four months.
customer_reviews.author: Blaze

customer_reviews.title: Great ball.. not a brand name so no one will want to steal it.
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad ball. Not a brand name so no one will want to steal it. Make sure to put the right amount of air. It makes a huge difference in the feel and quality of the ball.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware: They don't send what is advertised
customer_reviews.text: I re-ordered what had been fine: 6 deflated soccer balls to put into Operation Shoebox gifts. Last year they came fine. The offer listed "ships deflated." Not so. Got two boxes with 6 inflated balls that have to be deflated by hand. Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: pgh62

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephew and we were all impressed with the quality!
customer_reviews.author: KaylaG

customer_reviews.title: Happy grandson
customer_reviews.text: My grandson adored it! He couldn’t wait to show his teammates.
customer_reviews.author: vose

customer_reviews.title: The Real Thing
customer_reviews.text: As described, this is a serious soccer ball. There is nothing not to like. My grandson loves it.
customer_reviews.author: L Clark

customer_reviews.title: Nice ball for the price
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my 13 year old some. Ball seems very good and meets his needs for soccer practice. Holds air and has nice feel.
customer_reviews.author: Al R

customer_reviews.title: Totally great quality
customer_reviews.text: My dogs after months have still not popped it. Every other ball i ever bought them in the past popped.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my 2 1/2 year old grandson. Perfect size for him.
customer_reviews.author: Carol M.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and my kids love playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy101

customer_reviews.title: Awesome ball
customer_reviews.text: love this ball. The quality is superb even after daily use and abuse. Don't let "reviews" make the decision for you, for under $20 just buy it and try it out. Worst case scenario is you donate a practice ball to your local park district or school. Best for pick up games, or as a practice ball.
customer_reviews.author: CHITownPete

customer_reviews.title: Excellent feel and movement.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality ball for beginners. It has a nice glossy finish with good movement on the lawn while retaining a soft leather feel (does not have a cheap plastic ball feel). My 3.5 yo loves it, but the quality is good enough for a college level practice ball.
customer_reviews.author: C A L

customer_reviews.title: perfect for little kids
customer_reviews.text: grandson has improved his skills in his first year of the game
customer_reviews.author: Laura G.

customer_reviews.title: Great ball for the money
customer_reviews.text: I rated this ball 5 stars because we have bought multiple soccer balls for our son and this one has provided the best value for the money. by no means is it a professional ball but it is still fine for kids in the 6-10 range. Bonus - it comes inflated!
customer_reviews.author: That Helpful Dad

customer_reviews.title: Good quality soccer ball
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the leather looks and feels good and so far it has done an excellent job of retaining the air it came with. I did some research on reviews and these were the two areas people complained about, so when I found the good reviews on this ball, along with the very reasonable price, it was an easy choice.
customer_reviews.author: viperccp

customer_reviews.title: worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: this is a perfect practice ball. it's got a good touch and grip that helps you in dribbling. stitching is ok. the best feature is the air retention, which is excellent. the only bad side was the shape - does not look spherical, although it's not easily noticeable. that should however not discourage you to buy this ball; perhaps the one i got was slightly distorted.
customer_reviews.author: Nimesh

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. I bought it for the padding
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. I bought it for the padding, in light of more recent data regarding children and heading in soccer. I am trying to get as much protection against concussions for my children as possible, especially in practices where they engage in repeated heading drills.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great ball for the money
customer_reviews.text: Second one of these for Men's Sunday night games. Held up good and everyone seems to like.
customer_reviews.author: M. Villaran

customer_reviews.title: Play ball
customer_reviews.text: Good quality soccer ball. My son plays with it every day.
customer_reviews.author: joel gold

customer_reviews.title: Decent duribility
customer_reviews.text: For the price I got these balls, they couldn’t be better.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Hoesing

customer_reviews.title: Great well made soccer balls
customer_reviews.text: Great well made soccer balls. I bought these to send in a shoe box for Operation Christmas Child. I was very happy with the quality of the balls. My only negative comment is I ordered three size 4 balls and received two size 4 and one size 3, It worked out fine and I gave the small ball to a younger child. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Seam untied
customer_reviews.text: Seam has already torn on it and have only played twice
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds air well and takes the daily abuse like a champ
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and well made ball. Holds air well and takes the daily abuse like a champ. Also, since it's not as flashy as some of the other balls on my son's soccer team, it lasted a whole season without disappearing.
customer_reviews.author: Tim MC

customer_reviews.title: Great little soccer ball.
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loves this thing. It is a good ball. Not much else to say.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Bojangles

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 2 year old, he loves kicking it. Perfect size for him to run and kick.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Jones

customer_reviews.title: This soccer ball is the bomb
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful soccer ball, I love this. Nice weight and touch, hold the air quite long, YES for MIKASA
customer_reviews.author: Deep

customer_reviews.title: A must-have ball for youth soccer coaches
customer_reviews.text: As a youth soccer coach, finding a durable ball that holds it shape and air over a long hot summer was a pain in the butt...till I found this ball. I have several of them and of all the brands I tried, this ball is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Stovall

customer_reviews.title: I'm a Coach - Great Price and Very Durable
customer_reviews.text: I'm a middle school soccer coach as well as director of coaching for our club travel teams. I purchased 24 balls last year and they ALL have remained inflated and are great practice balls. Two of them have tears due to hitting sharp edges like the top of a metal fence and the corner of a brick wall. But by far, these have been the best balls that I have ever purchased for our teams. In fact, I am posting this today because I planning on buying more for our team.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great training balls. Quality is proven. They are delivered semi inflated though.
customer_reviews.author: Driver

customer_reviews.title: Confess I bought this for my dog, I think ...
customer_reviews.text: Confess I bought this for my dog, I think he is a re-incarnated soccer goalie. So far the ball has held up under the pressure. Accomplished soccer players have fallen a field;-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality ball worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Got this ball for my son to use for soccer practice. Have not been disappointed. Seems of higher quality than the balls I looked at in my local stores at the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Krismck16

customer_reviews.title: Good quality bargain ball
customer_reviews.text: Came inflated, been beat with feet, and lost no air. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff  Czaja

customer_reviews.title: Seems good
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a quality ball. My Son liked the look and it got picked as the game ball the first time it was used.
customer_reviews.author: dbosso

customer_reviews.title: Great for ball machine
customer_reviews.text: We use these balls in a ball machine, so we wanted something inexpensive. These have been holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Reviewer

product_meta.title: Mikasa Serious Soccer Ball (Black/White, Size 4)
product_meta.description: Hard-headed? No? Welcome to the forgiving world of the Serious Soccer, Mikasa Sports USA's high-performance series with the added feature of soft, synthetic leather. The black, silver, and white design encases a butyl bladder for maximum air retention, making it ready for action at all times. Specs: Stitched synthetic leather cover. Black/Silver/White.
feature_bullets: The black, silver, and white design encases a butyl bladder for maximum air retention, making it ready for action at all times
Ball ships deflated. Inflation is required. Pump not included.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
